content.query:
SELECT [subs].[id] subID, [subs].[site] as subSite, [subs].[spotify_username] subSpotifyUsername, [accounts].[id] accountID, [accounts].[username] accountUsername, [accounts].[member_type] accountMemberType, [accounts].[created_timestamp] createTs
 FROM [foundation].[dbo].[spotify_user_accounts] [accounts]
 JOIN [raw].[dbo].[spotify_sub_accs] [subs]
    ON accounts.sub_id = subs.id
